hero.heading: LEAN Enterprise Consulting
hero.text: We transform your company into an efficient and customer-oriented organization through the use of Lean methodologies.
hero.small: For more than 40 years we have helped more than 200 organizations to be more productive and profitable through the identification and elimination of unnecessary processes, reduction of time and elimination of defects, among others.

services.heading: Our Services
services.text: We offer a variety of services focused on improving quality, efficiency, and customer satisfaction by eliminating waste and improving processes. Our main services are detailed below:

cards.heading: Lean processes
cards.text: We identify opportunities to reduce waste and improve the efficiency of your organization's processes.

cards.heading: Visual management
cards.text: We create visual systems to provide quick and easy-to-understand information about the status of processes and tasks.

cards.heading: 5S method
cards.text: We implement the 5S method to organize and maintain clean and orderly workplaces, improving efficiency and safety.

cards.heading: Kaizen philosophy
cards.text: We implement the Kaizen philosophy of continuous improvement, which focuses on identifying and eliminating waste and improving processes constantly.

cards.heading: Value stream mapping
cards.text: We identify and eliminate processes that do not add value to improve efficiency and quality.

cards.heading: Design of experiments
cards.text: We use design of experiments techniques to identify and analyze the factors that affect processes and decisions.

purpose.heading: Our Purpose
purpose.text: To assist on the transformation of our global community to create a positive, enduring change in the world.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.text: To help our clients achieve substantial and long-lasting improvements in their performance and to build a great firm that attracts, develops, excites, and retains the very best talent.

pillars.heading: The Three Pillars that support our Values

list.text: Adhere to the highest professional standards.
Create an unrivaled environment for exceptional people.

aboutpage.heading: About us
aboutpage.text:
Created in 2008, Lean Enterprise Consulting, Inc., has become a global key player in Validation, Regulatory Support, Process Improvement, Engineering and Tech Education, through the delivery of high-quality services that help organizations meet the growing challenges of quality, safety, regulatory, environmental protection and social responsibility. As a trusted partner, Lean Enterprise Consulting, offers innovative solutions that go beyond simple compliance with regulations and standards, fostering an increased ability to reduce risk, improve performance and promote sustainable development.

Lean Enterprise Consulting, Inc. focuses on supporting Life Sciences and general industry by aiming its delivery of services to the highest levels of customer satisfaction, striving on each and every task to exceed customers expectations. Lean Enterprise Consulting, Inc. started in business to collaborate with its client-base into achieving greater productivity and experience significant cost reduction

However, as this company has interacted in partnership with its customers, its has gained important knowledge and acquired an enhanced perspective on how to help them increase their profits and become more competitive. That is has evolved into a fundamental Value-Added Promise, which translates into tangible benefits for the client. Lean Enterprise Consulting, Inc. interventions transform customers´ needs and opportunities into measurable results.

inspiration.heading: Our Aspiration
inspiration.subheading: Accelerate a Sustainable and Inclusive Growth of our client and the global community.
inspiration.text: Since the beginning, we’ve always been strong believers in the operational and financial growth potential of our clients. Today, we’re privileged to work with local and global organizations, public and private; that are on a new and accelerated growth journey, one that pursues sustainability, inclusion, and economic growth, all at the same time.

list.heading: Serve as role model of Servant Leadership for our community.
list.text: Our comprehensive set of practices serve clients across most capabilities and industries. Our global servant-leader partners are responsible for delivering client impact, developing knowledge and capabilities, innovating, and developing people. They work closely with regional partners and many others to deliver positive, enduring change to our clients and stakeholders for the well-being of those being served.

list.heading: Promote a higher Code of Professional Conduct
list.text: Bring our values to life for our colleagues and clients all over the world.

list.heading: Advance Environmental Sustainability
list.text: Our strategy & actions helps us to minimize the impact our firm has on the environment.

services.title: Streamline Your Success with our Solutions.
services.subtitle: Streamline Your Success with LEAN Enterprise Consulting Services for Efficient Operations

details.title: Lean Processes
details.introduction: Our LEAN Processing service identifies business inefficiencies and waste, and uses LEAN principles to increase productivity and decrease costs. Our LEAN experts collaborate with you to create a tailored plan.

details.title: Process Analysis
details.description: Our team will analyze your business processes using various tools and techniques to identify areas of inefficiency and waste.

details.title: LEAN Implementation
details.description: We will develop a plan based on our analysis to implement LEAN principles into your processes using tools such as Kaizen events, 5S, and standardized work. We'll work with your team to ensure a smooth implementation and provide training.

details.title: Continuous Improvement
details.description: Our team will help you establish a culture of continuous improvement within your organization, providing ongoing support and guidance to sustain improvements and make further gains.

details.title: Metrics and Reporting
details.description: We'll establish metrics and reporting mechanisms to track progress and measure the impact of our LEAN Processing service, helping you identify further opportunities for improvement and make data-driven decisions.

details.title: Customized Solutions
details.description: We'll tailor our LEAN Processing service to meet your specific needs, developing a customized solution whether you need help with a specific process or want to implement LEAN principles throughout your organization.

details.title: Visual Management
details.introduction: Visual management is a key component of lean management, which aims to streamline processes and increase efficiency by improving communication and collaboration.

details.title: Visual Management Overview
details.description: A comprehensive overview of Visual Management principles and how they can be applied to improve business performance.

details.title: Visual Management Assessment
details.description: We will develop a plan based on our analysis to implement LEAN principles into your processes using tools such as Kaizen events, 5S, and standardized work. We'll work with your team to ensure a smooth implementation and provide training.

details.title: Visual Management Implementation
details.description: Customized implementation of visual management tools and techniques in your organization to enhance communication, collaboration, and productivity.

details.title: Kanban Board Development
details.description: Design and development of customized kanban boards to visualize work processes, manage workflow, and track progress.

details.title: Performance Metrics Development
details.description: Development of performance metrics and key performance indicators (KPIs) to track progress and measure success in achieving organizational goals.

details.title: Gemba Walks
details.description: Conducting Gemba walks with management and staff to identify waste, observe processes, and identify opportunities for improvement.

details.title: Visual Communication Tools
details.description: Developing and implementing visual communication tools, such as visual standard work instructions, to enhance understanding and consistency in work processes.

details.title: Lean Culture Development
details.description: Promoting a lean culture throughout the organization by implementing visual management practices, engaging employees in continuous improvement, and fostering a mindset of continuous improvement.

details.title: Training and Coaching
details.description: Providing training and coaching to employees and management on visual management principles and techniques to support ongoing improvement efforts.

details.title: Continuous Improvement Support
details.description: Providing ongoing support to ensure the sustained success of visual management initiatives, including continuous improvement efforts and regular review and evaluation of progress.

details.title: S5 Method
details.introduction: 5S method implementation reduces waste, improves efficiency, and creates a safer, organized work environment. Our consultants customize solutions for your organization.

details.title: Sort (Seiri)
details.description: This step involves identifying and separating necessary items from unnecessary items. This reduces clutter and makes it easier to find and access important items. Our consultants will help you categorize items and create a plan for disposing of unnecessary items.

details.title: Set in Order (Seiton)
details.description: This step involves organizing necessary items in a way that promotes efficient and easy access. Our consultants will help you determine the most efficient placement of items based on frequency of use and accessibility. This reduces time wasted searching for items and helps to streamline your processes.

details.title: Shine (Seiso)
details.description: This step involves regularly cleaning and maintaining the work environment to ensure that it is safe, organized, and visually appealing. Our consultants will help you develop a cleaning and maintenance plan that fits the needs of your organization.

details.title: Standardize (Seiketsu)
details.description: This step involves establishing standard procedures and practices to ensure that the 5S method is consistently applied and maintained. Our consultants will help you develop a plan for training employees and establishing protocols to ensure that the 5S method becomes a part of your organizational culture.

details.title: Sustain (Shitsuke)
details.description: This step involves creating a culture of continuous improvement and sustaining the gains made from implementing the 5S method. Our consultants will help you establish a system for ongoing evaluation and improvement to ensure that the 5S method continues to be effective in the long term.

details.title: Keyzen philosophy
details.introduction: Keysen Philosophy is a service from our Lean consultancy that applies Keysenian economic theory, which believes government intervention can stabilize and grow the economy by managing aggregate demand.

details.title: Consultancy on government policies
details.description: We provide advice on how government policies can impact your business and how you can adjust your operations accordingly.

details.title: Strategic planning
details.description: We help you develop strategic plans that take into account economic trends and government policies, allowing you to make informed decisions about the future of your business.

details.title: Demand forecasting
details.description: We provide tools and techniques for forecasting demand for your products or services, allowing you to optimize your production processes and supply chain management.

details.title: Investment analysis
details.description: We can help you evaluate potential investments based on their economic impact and potential returns.

details.title: Risk assessment
details.description: We provide risk assessment services to help you identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies that align with the Keysenian economic theory.

details.title: Business cycle analysis
details.description: We analyze the business cycle to help you understand where your business stands in relation to the overall economic trends.

details.title: Performance metrics development
details.description: We help you develop performance metrics that reflect the principles of the Keysenian economic theory, allowing you to measure the impact of your business decisions on the economy.

details.title: Training and education
details.description: We provide training and education to help you and your team understand the principles of the Keysenian economic theory and how to apply them to your business operations.

details.title: Value Stream Mapping
details.introduction: Value stream mapping (VSM) is a powerful tool used in Lean manufacturing and management to identify waste and improve processes.

details.title: Identify the value stream
details.description: The first step in Value Stream Mapping is to identify the value stream, which is the entire process from start to finish that adds value to the customer.

details.title: Analyze the value stream
details.description: Once the value stream is identified, the next step is to analyze it. This includes mapping out the flow of materials, information, and people through the process, as well as identifying areas of waste and inefficiency.

details.title: Identify areas for improvement
details.description: Based on the analysis, areas for improvement are identified. These could include reducing lead times, eliminating waste, improving quality, and increasing efficiency.

details.title: Develop an improvement plan
details.description: Once areas for improvement are identified, an improvement plan is developed. This plan includes specific actions to be taken, who is responsible for each action, and a timeline for completion.

details.title: Implement improvements
details.description: The improvement plan is put into action, with regular monitoring and tracking to ensure progress is being made.

details.title: Measure results
details.description: After the improvements are implemented, results are measured. This includes tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) to ensure that the improvements are leading to tangible results, such as increased efficiency, improved quality, and reduced lead times.

details.title: Continuously improve
details.description: Value Stream Mapping is an ongoing process, and it's important to continuously monitor and improve processes to ensure they remain efficient and effective.

details.title: Design of Experiments
details.introduction: Design of experiments (DOE) is a powerful tool used in Lean manufacturing and management to improve processes, products, and services.

details.title: Define the problem
details.description: The first step in Design of Experiments is to define the problem that needs to be solved. This could be related to a process, product, or service.

details.title: Identify the factors
details.description: Once the problem is defined, the next step is to identify the factors that may affect the outcome. These could be related to the process inputs, such as temperature or pressure, or to the product or service features, such as color or size.

details.title: Determine the levels
details.description: For each factor, the levels need to be determined. This means deciding on the range of values that will be tested for each factor.

details.title: Develop the experimental plan
details.description: Based on the factors and levels, an experimental plan is developed. This plan includes the design of the experiment, such as the number of runs, and the order in which the runs will be conducted.

details.title: Conduct the experiment
details.description: With the experimental plan in place, the experiment is conducted. This involves collecting data on the outcome variable(s) while systematically varying the input factors.

details.title: Analyze the data
details.description: Once the experiment is complete, the data is analyzed to determine the effects of each factor on the outcome. This can be done using statistical methods such as analysis of variance (ANOVA) or regression analysis.

details.title: Draw conclusions and make recommendations
details.description: Based on the data analysis, conclusions are drawn and recommendations are made. This could include changes to the process, product, or service design to improve quality, reduce waste, or increase efficiency.

details.title: Implement the recommendations
details.description: The recommendations are put into action, with regular monitoring and tracking to ensure progress is being made.

details.title: Continuously improve
details.description: Design of Experiments is an ongoing process, and it's important to continuously monitor and improve processes, products, and services to ensure they remain efficient and effective.

cards.name: Miguel Rodriguez
cards.title: Executive Advisor profile
cards.bio:
Miguel is a manufacturing, quality systems and program management consultant, with over 30 years of experience in Pharmaceutical and Medical Device operations, assessing organizations critical business requirements, identifying deficiencies and potential opportunities, and developing innovative and cost-effective solutions for enhancing competitiveness.

Prior to joining LEC, Miguel spent first part of his career working for pharmaceutical companies (Baxter and Procter and Gamble) in manufacturing, engineering, quality systems and project management roles in United States and Puerto Rico. During the last 15 years, Miguel has also worked with Medical Device companies (Medtronic, St Jude Medical, Oscor Inc.) in technical and leadership positions as Director of Operations, General Manager and COO, in US, Puerto Rico and Dominican Republic.

He has a broad range of experiences in manufacturing technologies and products such as:

  • Liquids, Emulsions and Creams (Health and Beauty Care Products)
  • Solid Dose Manufacturing/Products (Analgesics)
  • Catheters, Guiding Sheaths and Introducers (Vascular / Peripheral applications)
  • Pacemakers and ICD’s (Cardiac Rhythm)
  • Implantable Leads (Pain, Heart, DBS)
  • Mechanical/Tissue Valves (Heart valve repair/replacement)
  • Diabetes Infusion Pumps and accessories (reservoirs/sensors)
  • Implantable drug infusion pumps (pain management)

He received his Bachelor of Science degree in Industrial Engineering (BSIE) from the University of Puerto Rico. Has participated in several development programs on statistics (University of Tennessee), Leadership Development Program (Wharton Business School), Advanced Program/Project Management (Procter & Gamble). During the last few years, Miguel has provided consulting support and advice to Pharmaceutical/Medical Device companies in the United States, Puerto Rico and Caribbean in areas related to Quality Systems and Remediation Strategies, Business Strategy Development and Deployment, Manufacturing Operations, Lean Manufacturing Systems, and Program/Project Management.

cards.name: Eddie Ignacio
cards.title: Executive Advisor profile
cards.bio:
Eddie Ignacio is a highly diverse operational leader with over 40 years’ experience in the electronic, chemical, conversion, consumer lighting, access retail & professional product, and pharmaceutical / medical device industries. Prior to starting with Lean Enterprise Consulting Inc., Eddie was part of several major companies including: Intel, Western Digital, Johnson & Johnson, General Electric and WernerCo. He is recognized for transforming global operations systems profitably and productively. Throughout his career held both domestic and international assignments with assignments held in Puerto Rico, USA, Mexico, Ireland, Italy, Brazil, Netherlands and Switzerland.

Eddie has a Bachelor of Science: Electrical Engineering from the university of Puerto Rico (Mayaguez Branch). He is a certified Six-Sigma Master Black Belt since 1995 who has trained over 250 professionals around the world. Fully Bilingual: English and Spanish In his last role as Executive Vice-President of Operations / Chief Operating Officer, Eddie was responsible for establishing short / long term business objectives and optimizing human capital at all levels. His areas of expertise include, amongst other things, the following:

  • Worldwide Operations & Manufacturing
  • Global Procurement & Sourcing
  • Start-ups & turnarounds
  • Global Logistics & Supply Chain
  • Lean Manufacturing & Six-Sigma
  • Quality Assurance & Process Excellence
  • Acquisitions & Joint Ventures
  • Regulatory Compliance

As an internal and external consultant, Eddie has been providing training and consulting advice to companies in the United States, Asia Pacific and Europe in areas related to Six-Sigma, technical writing, operational principles, ISO Quality Systems, leadership, and others.

cards.name: Roberto Correa
cards.title: Executive Advisor profile
cards.bio:
Roberto Correa has extensive experience in Medical Device Operations and Quality System Operations including Supplier Quality Management, Manufacturing Management, Strategic Planning and Development, Organizational Alignment and Development.

Prior to starting with Lean Enterprise Consulting Inc., Roberto was part of two major companies: Johnson & Johnson – a global leader in health products where he gained his medical devices experience during his 34 year association working in Brazil, United States, Mexico and Puerto Rico and project management in Germany, France, Scotland, Netherlands, Mauritius, India, and China, and them with CR BARD a multinational medical device company during his 4 year association working in United States, Mexico and Puerto Rico .

Device specific experience includes a broad range of class I, II and II products as:

  • Urology products (Foley Catheters & Catheter Accessories, Urinary Collection Products, Urological Monitoring Systems, Wound Drainage and Drainage Tubes)
  • Peripheral Vascular systems (Vascular Grafts, Angioplasty Catheters, Stents, Implanted Ports, Enteral Feeding Devices, Central Venous Catheters)
  • Access Systems (Dialysis Catheters, PICC Lines)
  • Wound closure systems (Surgical Sutures, staples, and topical glue)
  • Breast Implants and Surgical meshes.

He received his Bachelor of Science degree in Civil Engineering from the FVE (Brazil) and MBA from Fundacao Getulio Vargas (Brazil)./

As a consultant, Roberto has been providing training and consulting advice to medical device companies in the United States and Latin America in areas related to Quality Systems Strategy, quality systems requirements (ISO / FDA / ANVISA) , QS assessment and compliance, compliance gaps remediation, quality metrics, and human error reduction, regular FDA inspections, audit programs, , supplier selection and management.

cards.name: Thomas Agrait
cards.title: Executive Advisor profile
cards.bio:
“ Coaching organizations and its associates in making skillful choices to reach their desired personal & business results.”

Thomas H. Agrait, president of Lean Enterprise Consulting Inc. brings the best of two approaches to his work with clients: a very extensive experience in Process Excellence and unique individual expertise in evoking excellence in his counseling clients by creatively and with an experienced judgment integrating Neuroscience to all his projects, component which evoke natural and individual excellence on all his project team members toward the different assignments. This approach, very well orchestrated, has the power to aligning high-impact behavior at every level of the organizations toward achieving breakthrough execution.He believes that Corporations are victims of the great training robbery. American companies spend enormous amounts of money on employee training and education—$160 billion in the United States and close to $356 billion globally in 2015 alone—but they are not getting a good return on their investment. For the most part, the learning doesn’t lead to better organizational performance, because people soon revert to their old ways of doing things.
Dr. Agrait partners with worldwide clients to assist them envision, strategize and implement changes—- including Leadership programs, from crystal clear vision, strategies and goals to aligning individuals and multiple teams around a common purpose and press forward to execute in order to achieve their goals. Over the last 25 years, he has worked with a wide spectrum of clients from Pharmaceuticals, Medical Devices, Insurance Companies, Integrated Logistic companies to foreign and US local community/non profit groups.

Specialties: Lean Six Sigma Practitioner in Pharmaceutical, Biotech , Medical Devices, Health and Services Companies
